content.detailedDescription:
We were sitting at the intersection of washington st and raceway rd (39°43'45.98"n 86°19'35.38") facing south twards the airport waiting for the traffic-light to change at roughly 21:00(-5gmt) october 25th 2014.  

i noticed a red light moving across the sky. i didn't really think much of it at first, being so close to the airport, but upon second glance there were no navigation lights on the thing and it was moving quite fast for a passenger aircraft.  moreover as i focused on the object, it was what looked like a sort of triangular ovoid that was emitting flames in all directions.

i pointed it out to the person in the passenger seat.

they tried to get a picture, but camera phones are useless for night-sky images near cities.

we watched as it circled the airport until the traffic-light turned green and we turned and headed east. we watched it as much as we could while driving.  we lost view of if behind a row of trees and laughed about how we had just seen a ufo.


i do regret not being able to give you my name or contact information.
content.summary: Noticed flaming object in the sky that was moving quite quickly.

content.detailedDescription:
I wss out on back porch at about 4:30 a.M. and i saw the usual object we look for most every night...This object is normal for us to see even though it moves at a very very rapid pace from s to n in the ese sky...After locating and viewing tjis object i suddenly saw 4 glowing orbs above me...Rotating positions 2times befor it disappeared...
the orbs seemed to be bluish white in color and were clouded even though there were no clouds..
the orbs disappeared as fast as they appeared....
i knew it was a ufo the second i saw it...I felt elated...This isn't my first sighting...We have seen ufo at tjis location even during daylight hours...
content.summary: Went outside and while outside i saw a moving object at ese moving at rapid pace to n...This wasn't unusual ...Above me appeard 4orbs that were rotating in sequence then disappeared as fast as they appeared

content.detailedDescription:
Camping, i noticed a steady bright light to the northwest. watching for about a minute, it didn't stop or deviate from it's course to the southeast. after passing, about half way from straight-up to the horizon, the light seemed to dim like i was out of direct line a beam. no navigation lights on the sides. no belly warning flasher. and no sound. 

now the strange part. when out of the direct line of the bright light, the outline could still be seen. even at a range of a few hundred feet that light would have had to be huge--yards across. as if to confirm i didn't miss anything there were several other commercial craft in and around the area. all had the expected lights and most made enough noise to hear. about 2 hours later a jet, on a similar heading to the silent one, was heard and when found had the expected navigation and belly lights. this was the same area where i saw my flying stop sign a few weeks ago.

my location was 39* 19' 23"n 86* 13' 9"w i first sighted the object to the nw at about 50* at the closest it was about 80* up to the sw. out of the direct light at about 35* lost sight behind trees at about 40* elevation to the se
content.summary: Steady bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was entering a restaurant in wexford, pa on sunday october 26th at 5:55pm. a white object caught my eye and at first i thought it was a jet airliner. it was moving from north to south in a straight line. it was a cloudless clear 60 degree afternoon. as it flew over my head i noticed that it was a bright white color, not the typical dull airline, and appeared to have no wings. it also didn't have a thin clean cigar shape like a jet. it was bulkier and seemed to come to more of a point. then i realized that it didn't seem to make any sound. even jets at high altitude can usually be heard. i also realized that it didn't leave any contrails. it appeared to be flying at an elevation around 30,000 to 40,000 ft at a speed around 300 to 500 mph. jets at that altitude leave contrails. at least i think they do. i took a picture and video with my phone but it's sketchy at best. i looked away for a min and it was gone. i couldn't find it again. although i'm 42 years old and have excellent long distance eyesight, i was probably just seeing things, but i thought i'd report it anyway in case someone else did too. you never know. it flew at jet height and at jet speed. but that seemed to be all it had in common with a jet.
content.summary: All white, reflective, moving about jet speed, no wings, no sound, no contrails

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was driving near reed station rd in jackson county near carbondale illinois at around 9pm when i observed dozens of reddish orange orbs were seen hovering and also flying in a diamond formation above me and above the trees in front of my truck...Some were landing in nearby woods and some were taking off. i kept driving so i lost site of the orbs..
content.summary: Dozens of red orange orbs seen flying and hovering

content.detailedDescription:
Observed and photogrpahed from the quiktrip at mableton parkway, mableton ga (30126) near discovery parkway, directly over the fulton airport (fulton industrial blvd area) at initial and closest observation. continued to move steadily and often very quickly to the west. 

appeared to be five sided or diamond shaped and either flashing white and then going black,(as i saw it), or spinning and reflecting sunlight in a constant pattern (as the two other witnesses saw it)... 

two distinct objects with erratic and seemingly intelligent vectors and speeds. moved in changing hovering, huge northern and western "jumps." 

observed over the course of fifteen minutes, from 215pmet to 230pmet

witness former military officer with aviation background. not a military craft or drone.

only captured three photos, including one with aircraft flying by the two objects. processing images now.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Two angular objects wil slow and extreme vector change

content.detailedDescription: From my patio in se denver west to the foothills below mt. evans and due south are nightly lights that flare up and fade away. first noticed in july and have observed on a regular basis since. now that the tress are losing leaves, i have a wider view of the mountains and am see more of them. i thought they were car headlights or warning towers for small planes. some of the lights appear fixed, as they are in the same location when they appear. but they don't appear every night. others come and go. i'm now seeing them at sunrise, swarming in clusters in a small area before disappearing. it's as if they're returning 'home' from a night of activity. saturday evening, 10-18-14, the sky was totally clear except for a wispy cloud formation over our neighborhood. inside the thickest part of the cloud was a beam of light rotating clockwise. as the cloud drifted toward the west, so did the ball of light. it eventually dissolved. now that i'm reading of these accounts on mufon, i want to add my experience. it's very puzzling and addictive.
content.summary: Nightly lights in foothills west of denver evenings and right before sunrise

content.detailedDescription: I was helping a friend put up a sign right across the street from maggiano's restaurant located in the fashion mall area. i was holding the ladder for my friend when i looked to the sky and saw a bright dot. when i looked closer i counted 10 dots. all differnt colors. looked to be solid and headed in the direction of the sun. i saw this for about 5 minutes until it was out of sight. my friend at the time saw this as well.
content.summary: 10 different dots in sky with different colors. looked to be heading in the direction of the sun.

content.detailedDescription: We were driving from arizona to california on aug 15th, 2014. we took many pictures, but this was the only one that showed a spherical shape (similar to the image seen by john h. janssen in morristown, new jersey on  july 10, 1947). i only mention this reference so as to give a reference of the shape that showed up on this one picture. i neither heard, felt or saw a presence of anything unusual at the time. we were the only 2 adults on the road with our car pulled over when i took this pic. all other pictures taken at the same time same day does not have these lights. so i'm not sure what, if anything, it is?
content.summary: Saw the spherical shape in the photo attached.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying to toronto on july 31st, 2014. i had an aisle seat, but lucky me the middle and window seat were empty, so i had the whole row to myself. i decided to sit by the window so i could look outside and lean my legs against the wall of the plane. as i was looking out the window i noticed a massive triangle, large enough for me to see from an airplane, and it was in an area surrounded by trees and mountains. there was nothing but untouched and uninhabited nature for miles/kilometers. the triangle was impossible to miss. and it was a perfectly shaped. all i could think is how could something of that size be cut so perfect. then i starting thinking why is there a giant triangle cut out in the trees in the absolute middle of no where. if it were for foresting they would cut a whole section, not a triangle. nothing made sense as to why the triangle was there. i took out my phone and took pictures of it, but the photos don't do justice to what i saw with my own eyes. i snapped a couple pictures as quickly as i could, then we flew beyond the triangle and it was out of sight. i kept looking at my pictures once the plane was beyond the triangle, zooming it and trying to examine what it could be. i have no answers.
content.summary: Saw a massive and perfectly symmetrical triangle shape in the middle of no where while on an airplane

content.detailedDescription: Hey everybody it was a beautiful day in chicago yesterday warm and sunny i looked up to noticed that the usual flight path coming in to o'hare airport had moved half mile north looking up but east to my amazement i saw two blue orbs glowing or probes as to float but moving in unison heading due east it was beautiful second time in my life i saw something not from here or are they.
content.summary: As soon as i saw the two blue lights i knew i was looking at orbs or probes of ufo sightings no doubt i believe there all around us and more to come

content.detailedDescription: I was in the tent with friends i was watching through the window when i saw that object first i thought that it was an airplane it was a black object donot form because it was dark but a large central light with lights that changed color around and it looked obejto into circles and was moving towards multi-sided i thought it was a plane but after i knew what i did was not call a friend and together we saw that out of the tent to see we were scared and excited after we saw that descended from the trees and did not see more
content.summary: I was in a tent when i saw lights in the sky and the object was making circles

content.detailedDescription: I was told about these things in the sky my son and one of his friends kept saying they see all the time. i gave my sons friend my number and asked him to call me. several nights later i got a call. i drove from arvada co to golden co. about 20 min.I was told to wait. my son's friend dalton told me "there!" and points up. in the southwestern shy i see an object. it appears to be moving about 35 mph in relation to the ground. it appears to be a cluster or "stack" of objects in a group. i will describe as best i can. in the light available, the objects appear translucent or transparent. this object appears to be 500-1000 feet above me. it is absolutely silent and moving in a distinct, predictable path to my left as i face south. first heading east, then a slow turn to the north, flying right over my head. the object seems see-thru. it looks like a stack of plastic cups in a way. if you got say 10-15 clear plastic cups, laid them on their sides and took the bottom out of them and staked them on top of each other and pushed the stack through the air. the stack does not stay in perfect formation either. some of the stack move forward and back as separate parts. this all happens silently right overhead. i have seen several of them between the time of 7:30 and 9:30 on this date. some formations are large consisting of as many of 30 or more of these small objects inside and travel through the air in a slight partial curve making a kind of 3d leading edge made up of the parts as the single parts move forward and back from the formation. there is most certainly light emitting from these objects. it's impossible to tell if the light being seen from these objects is reflected or created by them. that is because of their translucent nature. i suspect the light is reflected by these objects because they can't be seen at all unless you are in a particular part of the mountainside we were on with lighting from a large building complex nearby. i saw at least two of these objects in the sky at once. at one time two of these passed right over my head with one above the other in opposite directions. i also witnessed one of these clearly under intelligent control make a very well-steered tour of the night sky covering my entire view as i blocked the light from a street light with my hand. i realize people are going to think i'm some nut. i wouldn't do this if i had any idea what these things are. i might add that i'm still not sure about the cup shape. when i got one of my better looks at these things, it almost appeared the stack was made up of rectangular shapes made of square shapes all exactly the same size and shape with tiny spots of light being either reflected of emitted from these objects seemingly in the same spot on each. i know this sounds crazy and i bet i blew the description, but i'll draw them also. i have 3 other people beside me that will absolutely swear to this including me. i am willing to show these objects to anyone who will listen. i am not joking about these. this is very much real and frankly, i'm very upset because i can't understand this.
content.summary: Multiple, nearly nightly sighting of objects in sky intelligently controlled

content.detailedDescription: The object appeared to be at a high elevation, it was stationary, consistent..Too large to be a planet, too large to be a star..The time was twilight, there was no cloud cover, visibility was prefect..The object was such that i presumed it was not a natural celestial object..
content.summary: It appeared to be a plane, but it was stationary, it was twilight, perhaps a star of planet, but too large..

content.detailedDescription: Me and my wife were driving to put my 7mo old daughter to sleep it was very cloudy out but i could see 5 lights in a uniform shape also did see police car heading in direction of lights were seen.Montrose mi
content.summary: We seen it driveing to put my 7mo old to sleep i didn't think much of it until i had nightmarish dreams i rember seeing a police car also heading in the direction??Confusing

content.detailedDescription: I had stepped out side my house to get some fresh air and star gaze due to my insomnia, and i noticed off to my left dead east a pulsing red-orange and blue light about 20 degrees off the horizon out toward the air field. i thought to myself "hmmm, now what is that?" it wasn't like any plane i had seen before. thinking it might be a planet i tried to get it on my camera phone, (usually i cant get any light past a quarter mile on my phone in the dark) the first object registered on my phone so i took some pictures trying to use the street light as a reference. then there was a meteor shower of about 5 to 7 streaks of light just over my head, i happened to look up, while i was scanning the sky looking for an explanation of this object. i went inside to get my sister in-law who was still up to come out and see this weird thing. she came out and observed the object with my wife their other sister and my mother in-law. as they all went back inside out of fear/and an unwillingness to be out in the dark and cold i stood and watch the object for another 20 min i decided to look up on my phone where the planets where and according to the internet they would have been behind me in the west, so i set my camera to video and recorded the object some more. while i was scanning the neighborhood i notice a second light to the south east over my friends house. it too was moving in a slow wobbly vertical motion flashing none standard aviation colors. in total i have several pictures and 3 videos. unfortunately my phone is dead, i have it on a charger but i cannot submit the photos or videos at this moment in time.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: bright lights in the sky that shouldn't be there.

content.detailedDescription: Star like white object/light traveling east from western horizon. changed directions at 45 degrees above horizon and began traveling south. object changed colors from white to orange red color. object had continuous illumination and no blinking. slight pulsation only. object traveling at many times faster than jet aircraft. was observed by me and my two children age 9 and 12. no cloud cover at time of observation. object vanished in clear sky 10 seconds after turning to reddish color. vanished before our very eyes without explanation.
content.summary: Star like object traveling east changed directions and changed colors from white to red before vanishing before eyes.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking back to my dorm at night (michigan state university) listening to music on my headphones. i was looking up at the stars because the sky was extremely clear. i noticed light streaking across the sky in the corner of my right eye. i looked over and saw lights in a v-formation with several lights to the side that were in no particular pattern. the lights appeared to be the size and distance of airplane lights. the lights were moving very smoothly across the sky in a straight path. the lights stayed equidistant and locked in formation with each other for the duration of my sighting. the lights then disappeared behind a tree and then behind spartan stadium. if the lights were at the same altitude as airplanes, they would have been moving extremely fast. i immediately pulled out my headphones and i heard no sounds coming from the lights. the area around me on ground level was quiet.I had a small turf field with stadium lights to my left and a large set of fields with stadium lights to my right. beyond the field to my left was spartan stadium.

extra info:
the v part of the formation appeared to be much sharper than the v formation in the phoenix lights.
i believe the v-formation was comprised of more than 5 lights; although i am not really sure.

my explanation: a few seconds after the "lights" disappeared, i began to think "how?" and "what?". my theory is that it was a small flock of birds. the stadium lights that surrounded me could have reflected off of the underbelly of the birds, explaining why i could see them against the night sky. i believe the birds would have been brownish, but i can not speculate on size. the relative size of the "lights" and the speed would have made sense. i did not, however, see wings flapping.

my view on ufos: i am a strong believer in science and statistics, and i understand that alien life most probably does exist. that is exciting to me. however, i do not personally believe there is evidence that alien life has visited modern day earth. i think that most all ufo sightings are explainable.

side note: there was once a few years ago when i saw something thats behavior i still cannot explain. this lack of explanation bothers me!
content.summary: Lights in v-formation (extremely similar to phoenix lights) with other lights to the side in no pattern flew almost directly above my path and i believe i have an explaation.

content.detailedDescription: Last night when i came home from work and pulled in my driveway i seen a red orb floating across the sky, now i say floating because of the way it seemed to glide. i quickly grabbed my ipad from my passenger seat and ran to the end of the block to get a better view. i did manage to capture what you see here and i apologize about the cursing i was kind of excited. if anyone has a way of analyzing this please do. this was taking in springfield il at about 8 pm or so the object was not very high up and definitely nothing that i know to be in use by commercial conventions.
content.summary: Red orb cruising

content.detailedDescription: I live in the country and was outside buzzing my hair out back and i always just look up at the sky when there is no clouds since its so beautiful in the country with no city lights.  i saw a couple airplanes as i sat and brushed off my excess hair and as i went from looking straight up i looked more towards the south and saw a white light moving very fast.  i dont know how high it was but i suspect it was very very high.  it changed direction towards the east on a dime and made a zig zag type of move the only thing that came into my head was like barry sanders running around but it zig zagged so fast it felt like my mind took a minute to catch up. it then either broke into 3 total spheres or lights that started to dance around each other.  right before it broke off it went from a white/blue type color and changed a bunch of colors in a split second but i do remember a flash of purple green and some kind of beautiful blue. when they danced around still flying and moving about very fast they changed colors but the faster they "danced" the more the colors changed and when they werent moving as much colors still pulsed but it was slower.  the colors i mostly saw were a mix of white, purples and violets, and blues and greens. mostly purples and blues. im not sure exactly how long this happened since i just stood there in awe watching it.  but they headed north/north east and looked like the 3 orbs went back into one and then instantly lost view of it.  on a seperate note dogs and coyotes about 10 min later all around the area were howling which was odd but didnt even think about it meaning anything until i wrote this.  the feeling i got while watching this i was not scared or anything bad, i felt at peace and felt beauty like i was watching a famous artist paint.
content.summary: 1 white bright light moving fast changed color broke into 3 dancing changing colors no sound

content.detailedDescription:
Orange object came out of nw appeared to be pulsating thought it was satellite but to big the size of a pencil eraser also to late at night to be reflecting off sun unless extremely high in altitude kept going straight and disappeared going se
very odd sighting 
have seen satellites before but nothing this big and pulsating
content.summary: Orange object pulsating size of pencil eraser

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside on my property with the intention of taking photos then a video of the geoengineered clouds containing iridescence that i and many others have witnessed before.  upon doing so i was fortunate to observe a ufo and was able to catch it for a few seconds on video.  when viewed closely, it appears to change from, going from one to two spheres then zooms away at high velocity. i have seen other videos over the last few years showing similar events.  

note, this appears 57 seconds into the video for only 5 seconds, is very high up.  please pause and zoom at that point each second.  using the background clouds for reference one can see this change direction and morph then zoom away down to the left which is actually due north west in direction.
content.summary: I was out filming the geoengineered clouds containing iridescence

content.detailedDescription: Was walking to van it was between 8 and 9 pm at night, my gf's house is in line with normal air traffic so seeing air craft is no big deal. last night she said check it out and when i looked up i saw what looked to be two normal air craft with their lights and a third air craft with five green dots for lights it kind of looked like a quad drone air craft with the way the lights were position. one air looked to be following the ufo but all three at one point looked to be crowded together. then one followed the normal flight path while the ufo and the other plane kept heading east. there are trees in the area but where we were standing we could see all the aircraft for just a few minutes before they flew out of sight. it did seem at least with how the lights were set up to be the same size as the air craft following it.
content.summary: Saw two air craft and ufo flying along normal air traffic route.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the stars. i could see the milky way. i looked to the horizon and saw a dimly flashing light. it was hard to spot as it moved very slowly and only appeared as bright as a dim star when it flashed about every five seconds. it was moving south and made a very large hook in the sky. it came to a point directly above me and that is when i noticed another thing start to blink. the new one could have been there the whole five minutes i was watching this but i didn't notice it. they both moved towards eachother and parked a small distance apart. it was cool. two flashing lights blinking at different intervals above me. i told my dad to come look. his first words were well what the hell is that? suddenly, what i assumed to be an orbiting satalite came into view and crossed directly in front or behind these two objects and immediately the blinking stopped while the satalite continued on.
the obvious overview: the first object first came into view on the horizon and made a huge hook in the sky only to stop next to another object that appeared to be waiting for something. then a larger constantly lit object swoops them both up. i just witnessed an intergalactic bus stop.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: One object seeks out other object in sky and both disappear as satalite crosses path

content.detailedDescription: Taking baby out of car. looked up and watched a very bright white light floating across the sky from west to east directly above me. much like a satilite, just brighter or as bright as those rotating ones when the panels reflect the sun just right. the brightness however was constant, suggesting it's shape was sphericle or emitting its own light. the object traveled much too slow for an airplane and too slow for an orbiting satalite. i'm assuming that the apparent size of the object could not sustain orbit that close to the earth as gravity would overpower its outward trajectory. it appeared to stagger or jostle or however you'd describe not actually traveling in a straight line. i understand that humidity in the atmosphere can cause this effect. anyhow, this is why i called for my wife to come see. quick set car seat inside and we both ran quick to see it. it was just gone. it was so brief that i was not going to report this. i' m reporting this because i, for whatever reason, am witness to two other anomalies tonight that i'll describe in another post.
content.summary: Another orb lake elmo

content.detailedDescription: I was out on back porch smoking looking at the stars. i know what a plane is bc i'm next to theairport. they were not planes and they were focused on me. i'm a afghanistan veteran and honorable discharge.  before ufo s just appeared, i was unknowingly sending messages. things like do they exist and can they actually read minds. telepathically i'm assuming in which i didn't realize until the next day but before i knew it, they just appeared.  the orange bulb was the 1st in sight and the one i 1st communicated with 1st. once i realized they were communicating with me i asked if they were going to pick or me up. orange orb shook left and right. 3 other orbs appear. 2 orbs was bluish white, the other was multiple colors pulsating. i asked if the others would harm me and they all did the same thing. during this time,  i asked to get my brother and mother to witnesses what i was seeing. the ufo s shook up and down and i went to get them. when they came outside, i told my mom and brother to watch tbis.. i'm going to make this one move. 3-5 secession went by after i sent the message and sure as shit it moved. i did this with one of the blue orbs.  my family went inside and i stayed. when they left, they got more active and 3 of the ufo s were moving quickly in different directions and pulsating.  a helicopter arrived and went inbetween 2 orbs and they retreated. they returned 4 mins later never leaving my sight and focused back on me after helicopter left. it was 1 helicopter and another unknown plane .  before i got tired to go inside, the ufo s never left and acted as if they didn't want me inside. as i was walking away, i kept seeing streaks in front of my face like something at great speeds in which i only caught glimpses of.  also, during the communication process i noticed a orange orb smaller than rest 20-30ft above my head that never moved. i think it was a radar of some sort that they use somehow.  i took a 10 min video that only shows 2.Bulbs. it was like once i started recording they were less active. this was my 2nd encounter but the 1st time they actually focused on me.
content.summary: Communicated silently through head. i asked questions that got responses of the ufos moving left and right as no and up and down as yes. 2 helecopters arrived, flew inbetween 2 of ufo craft. they retreated apart and after they came back to me... more info

content.detailedDescription: We went out to dinner and were looking at the sky afterward. it was very dark and the sky clear. i was looking for meteors, and movement caught my eye. i saw three lights traveling together in a triangle formation. it was moving real fast. i pointed it out to my husband and we watched them fly overhead. overhead the object looked like it was solid and dark, blacker than the sky and it looked low. like low enough to hear if it had been a plane, but there was no sound. the lights on it looked as if you were looking at it though a lens, like they were fuzzy almost as if there was interference. shortly after it flew overhead,  it turned sharply to the west and the lights flew apart in different directions. and then it was gone.
content.summary: Triangle object with 3 lights turned and split apart after moving from in a se direction across the sky

content.detailedDescription: As i was walking back to my truck in a dark parking lot i saw a light. at first i thought it was a falling star, i see a lot of them here. however as the  'light' got closer i heard a high pich wine and the sound of air passing over something fast. my hear raced as i thought what ever it was was going to crash into the woods. it was then that i saw that this thing was made up of light, it past over me and disappear into the tree line.
content.summary: Light moving at crazy speed why loud blast of sound.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was coming home from a house that i am preparing to sell in the same city i live in.  when coming down one of the side streets in my neighborhood, i notices a large glowing object in the sky.  i always look at the sky so i know that this thing was never there before.  i got to my house within seconds of seeing it and i went inside to wake my kids up to see it.  this is something i would never do, but ti was just so mysterious and i wanted witnesses.  

they were both spooked when they saw it.  we all looked at it through binoculars and the only way i can describe it was as if the domed bottom looked like and old fashion sub or ship.  like it had rivets in it.  the top of it is very hard to explain but it looked like the top of a oil lamp lid with a stub of a wick coming out of it.  i thought the object was a hot air balloon, but it was way too late at night, way too windy, and it didn't move with the exception of lowering itself a little.

at first my kids thought it was the moon with a few dense clouds in front of it.  but once we looked at it through binoculars, it was very clear it was not the moon!

other than a very eerie, uneasy feeling, we felt normal.  we watched the object for 25 to 30 minutes.  we came in to get shoes on, and it was gone.  

i am 46 y/o and i have only seen one other ufo that i couldn't explain.  i am so happy to have witnesses and pictures.
content.summary: Object just sat in one spot, lowered a little, then was gone.  watched for 30 mins.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed the object from window in the living room so got up and looked to see what it was and noticed it wasn't a plane or helicopter so we grabbed the ipad and started filming the object . it was moving from the north towards the southeast at about the same speed as a small airplane , but was silent and very bright . it was a very bright orangish yellow color that seem to flicker and pulsate . i began to think it might be a chinese lantern , but it was way too large . it was pretty incredible . the object just disappeared like someone just turn the lights off .We had great visibility nice calm winds and clear sky at dusk .
content.summary: Large glowing light
